content: I see where you're coming from, but I don't think this would be a practical solution to cleaning up the pollution in our streets. Blind people often use walking sticks to help them navigate their surroundings, and replacing those sticks with brooms would not be helpful for them. Additionally, there are many other factors that contribute to pollution in our streets, such as litter, vehicle emissions, and construction debris, and giving blind people brooms would not address these issues.
